list.list_signal_loss: List of signal loss notification recipients

overview.note_power_flow: Display total active power data of each energy source component in all projects of the customer when pointing to the customer and total active power of a project when pointing to that project of the customer on the management tree. Total active power is the sum of active power of all measurement points marked as total measurement points on a single-line diagram (points with tick marks).
overview.note_energy_data: Display total energy data of each energy source component in all projects of the customer when pointing to the customer and total energy of a project when pointing to that project of the customer on the management tree. Total energy is the sum of energy of all measurement points marked as total measurement points on a single-line diagram (points with tick marks). There are view modes of Day (hourly power within the day), Month (energy for each day within the month), Year (energy for each month within the year), Total (energy for each year), and Custom (energy for selected days).
overview.note_map: Display the location of all projects of the customer on the map.
overview.note_usage_plan: Display the estimated energy usage and energy usage target of each project.
overview.note_energy_cost_revenue: Display electricity cost of each energy source component in low, normal, peak hours of each project.
overview.note_energy_statistics: Display the energy ratio of monitored energy source components of the project.
overview.note_warning_statistics: Display the ratio of monitored measurement points of energy source components of the project operating normally, with warnings, signal loss.
overview.note_management_failure: Statistically display the number of electrical equipment objects being monitored by measurement points that are operating normally, with warnings, or signal loss.
